thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Corrections & Amplifications

author: wsjcom
title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
0 COMMENTS Dow Jones & Co. in April 2013 sold its remaining stake in CME Group Index Holdings LLC, which holds a minority stake in S&P Dow Jones Indices, a McGraw Hill Financial Inc. MHFI -4.35 % unit that publishes the Dow Jones Industrial Average and other indexes. Money & Investing articles published Aug. 7, 2013 , Sept. 11, 2013 , and June 8, 2015 , incorrectly said that Dow Jones, a unit of News Corp that publishes The Wall Street Journal, still owned a stake in the venture.
The Journal of the American Academy of Dermatology in August published the results of a study of 16,570 melanoma patients at Kaiser Permanente Northern California. A Personal Journal article Tuesday about skin cancer incorrectly said the study was published by JAMA Dermatology.
Gen. George Patton’s notorious slapping of a private occurred in Sicily. A review of the book “Sicily” (“ Beauties and Medusas ,” Aug. 29) placed the incident in Cyprus, drawing on inaccurate information in the book.
